title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Legally assisted suicide to become law in New York State
items.description: “I was taught that God is merciful and compassionate, and so must we be,” Gov. Kathy Hochul wrote in an op-ed.

items.title: Amazon CEO Andy Jassy announces departure of AI exec Rohit Prasad in leadership shakeup
items.description: Prasad's exit comes after Amazon struggled to show its internal AI efforts could match those of rivals—and just as reports surface that Amazon is disc...

items.title: Experts say Amazon is playing the long game with its potential $10 billion OpenAI deal: ‘ChatGPT is still seen as the Kleenex of AI’
items.description: “If OpenAI wins the lottery, then they’d have the money to pay for this,” analyst Charles Fitzgerald said.

items.title: A U.S. oil blockade on Venezuela could ‘devastate’ its economy and further pressure Maduro. But how far is Trump willing to take it?
items.description: Questions abound about whether the White House will add new sanctions to oil tankers trekking to Venezuela and how broad the oil blockade will become.

items.title: Ray Dalio donates $75 million to ‘Trump Accounts’ as Scott Bessent leads ‘50 State Challenge’ to invest in America’s kids
items.description: "At an early age I was exposed to the stock market, and it changed my life,” the billionaire said in a statement.
